page.title: 17POLLUTION IN ALTRINCHAM
page.content:
ONE OF THE MAIN CAUSES OF POLLUTION IN THE LOCAL AREA IS {LITTER.}A SURVEY WAS CARRIED OUT OF THE TYPES OF LITTER FOUND IN THE GRID AREA ON ONE DAY IN JUNE 1985. THE RESULTS WERE: TYPE OF LITTER AREA PLASTIC PAPER METAL GLASS OTHER NAV.RD O O X X X BRK.CL O O X X O BROOK O O O O X DGTE.LN. O O X X O MARKET O O O O O ST.N.RD. X O O O O WELL.RD. X O X X X STM.PARK X X X X O GRM.SCHL O O X O O
O _ LITTER PRESENT X _ LITTER NOT PRESENT LITTER IS CAUSED BY PEOPLE NOT PUTTING IT AWAY IN THE BIN.EVERY SO OFTEN THERE IS A MAN WHO COMES ROUND TO SWEE
